issues.description: Duplicate CascadingAuthenticationState wrapper - Routes.razor wraps content in CascadingAuthenticationState but Program.cs also registers AddCascadingAuthenticationState(). While this won't cause errors, one of these is redundant.
The 'glow-button' class is used on the Google sign-in button as required, but the button could benefit from a more visible hover state indicator for accessibility.

buildOutput: Unable to run build command - dotnet SDK is not installed or not available in PATH on this system. The code review passed based on static analysis.
